::Aerotaur::
      "Windlord we have to go NOW!  No stay if you must. I'm 
leaving.  Nightlight and Trinity nead my help.   I'm going!  Come 
back as soon as you can."  Aerotaur transforms into roc mode and flew 
off toward his base.  On the way he sends a message to 
Nightlight.  "I'm coming.  How many enemies are there?"
